document.masterDocTitle: An updated catalogue of the Histeridae (Coleoptera) of Sardinia, with faunistic, zoogeographical, ecological and conservation remarks *

V .1935
, MBu, 2 ex (CUL); idem , 5.V.1970 , 1 ex (DPPS).
Italian distribution. All regions except Aosta Valley .
Ecology. Mainly found in various types of dung, but can also be found on carcasses and under decomposing vegetable matter.
Notes. Probably the most common histerid of Sardinia .
